website_summaries.verdict: The DC41's design disappointed us, and the Ball Allergy's isn't any better. Despite the strong performance scores, this pricey Dyson is still difficult to recommend.
pros: The Dyson Ball Allergy (formerly known as the DC65 Animal) vacuums even better on carpets than the DC41 that came before it, with improved airflow and a more powerful brushroll
cons: Annoying design issues that plagued the usability of the DC41 linger through to the Ball Allergy
Most notably, the vacuum clicks into its upright position, but it doesn't always stick and can come crashing to the floor

customer_reviews.title: Not thay great
customer_reviews.text: Highs and lows. Vacuums very well, to the Dyson standard I expect. But the ball is very annoying to stand upright and it tips easily when you use the hose attachment. It feels flimsy, but nothing has given out on us and it does work. But its unstable when upright, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tern

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I like the vacuum a lot. But, what in the heck is with sending a whole box of attachments that don't fit anywhere on the vacuum. You have to find a separate storage place. I thought Dyson were the engineering people?
customer_reviews.author: R. Brushia

customer_reviews.title: You thought your floors were clean.  Try this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this vacuum for the 1st yesterday. Wow, it has great suction. Seems very heavy duty and sturdy with one exception when you raise the handle for it to stay in up right position it doesn't want to lock in. It feels a little on rickety side. Other then that love the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kam12

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original Dyson Animal for 10 years and loved it. So when it finally needed replacement I ordered this one. It's a new model (rollerball). This thing is terrible. Either the hose doesn't have suction or the base doesn't have suction. Always taking it apart to see if there's a blockage (there never is) then it will work for a little while until the suction stops again. I should have sent it back right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This machine sucks.....better than most vacuums.
customer_reviews.text: It'll flat suck the loose grout out of tile floors. The main downside is the extension hose/wand. The hose is spring loaded and it is always being pulled back to the machine, or it pulls the machine back to you. It's a great resistance exercise for the upper arms when doing a lot of high cleaning. Also, there isn't any onboard storage for the wand attachments. I guess the designers figured you'd just carry them around in your pockets?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Peters

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed, our first one lasted 8 years
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2.5 years and was told that the motor is blown from the repair guy and that their quality has fallen off a cliff. Pretty disappointed, our first one lasted 8 years. I am working with their warranty dept, I called in and was told to use online chat due to high wait times. Also, Dyson is no longer making upright vacuum cleaners...
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: It arrived like it had been used. After several uses it started squealing. I believe the folks that say it breaks. It works, but RUNS VERY VERY HOT & Squeals. I tried exchanging it & received an email stating they don’t have anymore. Obviously they are still for sale. HOW DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Dyson lives up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: Dyson truly lives up to its claims! I am so impressed with the design, the quality of the parts, the suction even through the extended arm and accessories, length of the power cord, quiet operation, and complete wow!-ness of this Dyson machine. Without comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Irving Sambolin

customer_reviews.title: It's suction is superior, and the vacuum performs very well
customer_reviews.text: We are replacing an older Dyson. This model weighs less, which results in it being easier to maneuver. It's suction is superior, and the vacuum performs very well. The mechanics for holding the vacuum vertical when not in use is suspect, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Roody

customer_reviews.title: picks up the grossness our other vacuum left behind
customer_reviews.text: picks up the grossness our other vacuum left behind. Pet hair, whoosh! Dust whoosh! I will get the upholstery pet attachment, kind of pricey but it you have tweed or similar, you need a little extra to make the job go faster. Especially if you have a sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: I use it at the office to keep it as dust free as possible. My favorite vacuum of all time! The only thing that would beat this vacuum is if they made the same model with a Tesla-like battery.
customer_reviews.author: IntrepidSurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Does great on tile
customer_reviews.text: Dyson makes quality products, one year later still working, This was a lost package, Amazon replaced for free, top notch. We use this once a week in our 3 story Queen Anne House, Does great on tile, rugs and wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harkavy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the hose on the vacuum is difficult to extend with attachments due to the extreme suction
customer_reviews.author: lore von hoffen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My brother and mother suffer bad allergies and we have tried a lot of different vacuums that are allergy friendly but they were no good. This is really great and I have picked up things I didn't know that existed. It built really well. It's heavier but still really an amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mathews

customer_reviews.title: let's be honest here they are not cheap but I am so glad I finally decided to purchase one
customer_reviews.text: I always put off buying a Dyson vacuum because well, let's be honest here they are not cheap but I am so glad I finally decided to purchase one. This is by far the best vacuum I've ever owned, it is so powerful and so easy to handle I just love it!!! I strongly recommend this vacuum I just can't say enough about how satisfied I am with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Sigfridsson

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Dyson because I had an old one with which I was extremely happy for a long time. This new model turned out to be a nightmare. Hasn't worked properly since day one. Very poor suction. Had it repaired twice at Dyson's service center to no avail. The customer no service is very responsive to e-mails and that's all. They would not honor the warranty and refused to replace with a vacuum cleaner which actually vacuums. $400 down the drain. Avoid that flimsy junk
customer_reviews.author: George I. Milev

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast and is heavy
customer_reviews.text: The suction intake motor broke after only 3 months of light use. Plus, the vacuum is heavy and hard to push around. Doesn't get into the corners of the stairs very well either. Too bad, because it looks like a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: JHHVL

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my old one with this and was a little nervous to get a refurbished but the suction is amazing! Comes with tons of attachments (haven't tried them ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving this dyson! Replaced my old one with this and was a little nervous to get a refurbished but the suction is amazing! Comes with tons of attachments (haven't tried them all). It's very easy to use but at others stated it doesn't always stay upright when trying to click it in. I have to do it a few times for it to stay in upright position
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Fetters

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itself is great, however, the dyson product packaging was beat to a bloody pulp inside of the amazon package. Thankfully the actual contents were undamaged. Still worth the $309 sale price, but you might want to include that these may be open box or damaged boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ziola

customer_reviews.title: great product and cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: AAA+++ quality and service, great product and cleaning power. I highly recommend to anyone seeking a vacuum for allergy control. My wife is very sensitive to allergens and loves this product. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Naval Spook

customer_reviews.title: Great pet hair removal
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, how I love this thing! Replaced a much older Dyson that I thought still did great. It did not do this great!!
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: While I do like it, it really doesn't get everything up but ...
customer_reviews.text: While I do like it, it really doesn't get everything up but at least Its light and doesn't trigger an asthma attack when vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Trisha H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this vacuum. a little heavy but that means it's solid. clean the carpet very well. very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've always heard about the suction and now I'm a believer. Ran this new one over an area just done with the old vacuum and was very impressed with what the new one picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she couldn't love it more! It is so smooth and easy to use, we couldn't be happier! We actually like to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: I love how powerful this is as it sucks up all the dirt and dust and doesn't leave anything behind. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum. Sometimes difficult to snap back in upright ...
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum. Sometimes difficult to snap back in upright position. Canister is flimsy compared to older models.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D Wright

customer_reviews.title: Broken Parts
customer_reviews.text: Came dirty. Used. Canister was dirty. One of the attachments was already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Station 9

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum picks up much better than the Shark that I have been using
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum picks up much better than the Shark that I have been using. It is very easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love my dyson, the best purchase i've ever made for my home maintenance
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Light & maneuverable, the suction power is amazing...my carpets have never been this clean! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alison W.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum and it comes with 5 or 6 attachments, all of which are very useful. It has a very powerful suction in both the cleaner head and the hose/attachments. It was very easy to assemble and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LBela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The swivel on the ball is terrible. I can barely get the vacuum to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Dina McGuire-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and I would like to recommend this to anyone who is looking to buy a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this vaccuum and would absolutely recommend to others especially ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly this thing picks up pet hair and dust! Impressive and much more compact than my other Dyson that is 10+ yro. I have absolutely no idea what all these attachments are though....I will have to research that in order to use them because it didn't come with information on them. I love this vaccuum and would absolutely recommend to others especially if you have pets. Amazing results. Having cleaning fun. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Netter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. This is industrial power
customer_reviews.text: Wow simply amazing but only have owned for a month so far but the performance is top notch for sure. I'm happy I got this one over the more expensive big ball dyson with some filterless technology. This one really gets the job done well and has more suction power sitting at 245 air watts and the new big ball at only suction power of 180 air watts.
customer_reviews.author: Erik W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You should see the things come from your carpet with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: mali

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i was disappointed in the quality of this vacuum. I had the regular Dyson for 9 years and it was fabulous....this was $200 cheaper and it shows ---- plastic is cheap and it is awkward to maneuver --- the parts seem to follow off a lot. Should've just sucked it up and bought the expensive one!
customer_reviews.author: andrea smith

customer_reviews.title: To be honest...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with it is a simple procedure to put together but the directions are picture only so look carefully. Only has rear wheels so the push when vacuuming is tougher than a normal vacumn and accessories are a very loose snap fit I wouldn't buy again but to each his own
customer_reviews.author: Iamlegend1973

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product...very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I put this vacuum together in 5 minutes, and was using it right away. Assembly was a breeze. This is by far the best vacuum I have ever owned. I have had a very expensive rainbow and a very expensive Kirby. This vacuum, by far, exceeds my expectations. It is easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished "Allergy" Vacuum came covered in allergens
customer_reviews.text: So I know I ordered a refurbished Vacuum, but I figured it would have been cleaned. All the attachments had a film of dirt/dust and by the time I had the vacuum assembled my eyes were itchy and my allergies were kicking me right in the face. Not cool. Condition shouldn't be marked "New" and I shouldn't be exposed to allergens when buying an "Allergy" Vacuum. Likes: It vacuums Dislikes: Attachments and hoses not cleaned
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, hoping the durability is a little better than our first Dyson. Overall, great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley R Rice

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We have been dutifully vacuuming our rugs for years. The first time we used the Dyson the collection area was totally filled with rug debris. Fantastic! Well worth the money. I was somewhat skeptical because the Dyson is not "self propelled" as was our previous vacuum. It is actually easier to move an maneuver the Dyson than was the old vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: carpet gets really dirty. Dyson ball vaccum does the job
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 kids in house , carpet gets really dirty . Dyson ball vaccum does the job .
customer_reviews.author: Shachindra Bahadur

customer_reviews.title: Love Dyson BUT the brush stops spinning as soon as ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Dyson BUT the brush stops spinning as soon as we hit carpet! Works great on our tile floors. Ridiculous problem to have for a $389 vacuum!!! Not happy. Thinking about returning it and going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: OH_AZ2009

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is the most complicated vacuum I've ever encountered in terms of assembly, and the instructions may as well been written in a foreign language. Returning this will be much easier than trying to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: I had this vacuum from 1/2017 - 9/2019. While it worked it had great suction and worked great on wood floors. When it came to rugs it had too much suction and would suck the rugs up. The wand hose was kind of difficult to maneuver. Overall I really liked this vacuum because it had great suction to get dog hair and dirt off the wood floors. I previously had a shark that wouldn’t even suck hair off the floor. But the downside is it lasted 2 years and randomly broke and a vacuum this expensive should definitely have more life in it than that!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime and still going strong with very heavy use after 2 plus years!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our Boutique and it easily goes from concrete floor to carpet and all around the store fixtures. A big plus is that is does not blow dust around at all like our previous cheap vacuums. Worth every dime. I would purchase again for sure and am now sold on Dyson. I love the ball feature because it allows ease of movement around things. I am going to get another for my home. Love this vacuum.. Update 2 years later. This is by far the best vacuum ever. Does not blow dust around the room and I will NEVER go cheap on a vacuum ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion42030

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up to the Hype
customer_reviews.text: Lives Up to the Hype. We resisted buying one for many years, but caved when they went on sale for black Friday. These really do pull dirt right up from the subfloor and padding. Definitely get the hardwood floor sweeper attachment, the dog brush attachment, and the tangle free turbine if you have hardwood floors, pets, or upholstery. They are worth the additional cost. The hardwood floor sweeper attachment pulls dirt from under the edges of trim very well, and is more maneuverable than the vacuum. It has replaced our broom for sweeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Remington

customer_reviews.title: Good vaccume but has design flaws
customer_reviews.text: I've had this quite a few years now. Suction is still good despite the fact I don't maintain it like I should. The design flaws are... the fact you have to undo the cord to use hose and for the life of me I can not figure out the trick to get the hose back into handle. Sometimes it will go with no problem others I gotta fight with it. I will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: ... a DC35 before and this model is a lot better - lighter
customer_reviews.text: I had a DC35 before and this model is a lot better - lighter, easier to move and much better suction of very small dust particles.
customer_reviews.author: ComputerGeek

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for people with allergy and carpeted floor
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for people with allergy and carpeted floor. This vacuum cleaner sucks up dirt like no other. For test I first vacuumed my floor with my old vacuum cleaner then vacuumed the same floor again with dyson. I was surprised to see the amount of dust the dyson collected which my old cleaner left behind. Awesome cleaning power and very easy to dispose once the cleaner is full.
customer_reviews.author: Deeps

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to steer.
customer_reviews.text: This is very heavy, and seems to go where it wants to go rather than where I want it to. It takes a push with my foot to force it on a straight path. As an elderly woman, this is just too difficult on even my tile floors. A broom and dust pan is an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucked up dirt left in the carpet from our previous vacuum. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JBrough

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but beware the warranty! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS BUYER
customer_reviews.text: When I applied for my Dyson warranty through Dyson, they told me it was not valid. I contacted this seller and they said "don't worry, we'll cover it if anything goes wrong".
customer_reviews.author: RPH

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum did not have the sucking power expected from ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum did not have the sucking power expected from the disown brand. After four months the motor broke and is now unusable. I'll have to send it back to a dyson dealer for repair that will cost more money on top of the $399 I paid for it. The return policy through Amazon was only for one month.
customer_reviews.author: rob acton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my new one
customer_reviews.text: My last Dyson finally died after 12 years of use. I absolutely love my new one! I will only buy Dyson from now on! I bought a Bissell and it lasted 4 months, big mistake, I should have immediately ordered a new Dyson and saved that $150 I spend on the other vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie

customer_reviews.title: ... that quit or clog after a short time I LOVE this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: After years of buying cheap vacuums that quit or clog after a short time I LOVE this vacuum. I have never had a vacuum with such strong suction. It gets everything!
customer_reviews.author: LorriBoye

customer_reviews.title: One of the tools has fibers that get sucked into itself and blocks what you want to vaccume ...
customer_reviews.text: Hose is too inflexible and awkward to use. One of the tools has fibers that get sucked into itself and blocks what you want to vaccume up. I'm not very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is a compact...but...
customer_reviews.text: The description didn't have that it was the smaller model...I was looking for the full size. That being said, the vacuum works very well. I didn't send it back even though the size was smaller than I wanted. I still like Dyson vacuums because they handle cleaning better than any other vacuum I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haithcock

customer_reviews.title: I agree the suction is amazing! I am still getting up embedded dirt the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews shown. I agree the suction is amazing! I am still getting up embedded dirt the third vacuuming! And after I had the carpet shampooed last month. It works great on smooth floors as well as carpet, too. I bought the reconditioned unit [I couldn't have afforded or even considered otherwise], and it operates and looks as good as new. It has more attachments than I have been able to use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ol Gramps

customer_reviews.title: We had a dyson 25 so after 9 years it was time for an upgrade and our dyson 25 was a refurbished Vac wow they are great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. We had a dyson 25 so after 9 years it was time for an upgrade and our dyson 25 was a refurbished Vac wow they are great Vac
customer_reviews.author: wazzup

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Otherwise I need more just the pictures in manual, machine works beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum with strong suction. Was hesitant because of the price, but it performs way better than our old unit.
customer_reviews.author: qst

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I have two australian shepherds that shed constantly and I love the suction of this vacuum and it is very light weight. I do find the hose attachment when using tools is cumbersome. I may get the canister style to see if this one is easier to use with tools for hardwood floors and hard to reach areas like wall vents.
customer_reviews.author: C machnik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! so much better than our Bissell Pet hair eraser vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! so much better than our Bissell Pet hair eraser vacuum. So well in fact our carpet actually feels different
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: This Dyson has changed our home! The air feels ...
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson has changed our home! The air feels lighter after using it. The week it arrived, we vacuuming, re-vacuuming, and re-vacuuming our house. Each time, we filled the canister!! We couldn't believe how much our cheap HEPA vacuum was missing. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt believe what came out of my carpet the first time I used it. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: mpdesertstorm

customer_reviews.title: I love Dyson, so I bought another
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson. The first, was sadly lost by natural causes (R.I.P.). Anywho, I love Dyson, so I bought another. They don’t lie about their products, and in my book, that is awesomesauce. Kudos to them!
customer_reviews.author: Cate F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great auction and the power head is incredible . It is heavy to push but works great
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product is great, had to assemble vacuum took a little time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our house was so disgusting-- it didn't look disgusting, but it was
customer_reviews.text: Our house was so disgusting-- it didn't look disgusting, but it was. I love vacuuming just to see all of the dust and skin cells collecting.
customer_reviews.author: cakedecor

customer_reviews.title: I love it. 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! I love it. 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, and we got a factory reconditioned. It gets a workout here.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Camper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE my new Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Been A Dyson fan. Tried MANY vacuums after my first Dyson but the dust. LOVE LOVE LOVE my new Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Had my old Dyson for about 10 years. Took it apart to clean and could never it it to go back to full suction, so I figured it was time for a new one. This new one took 10 seconds to put together (not sure what others are complaining about there), but it is a pain to maneuver. My wrist kills me from trying to get it where I need it to go exactly. It is hard to get it to turn just a bit. Will keep it but liked my old one way better. Thought I was going to get an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love Dyson products, but their design is unusually awkward when utilizing the extending functions
customer_reviews.author: Guy Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Great dyson vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great! We really like it. It's very durable and I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: wendy e Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love it. Easy to use & maneuver around furniture.
customer_reviews.author: kathyb

customer_reviews.title: I am now a believer in the Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought cheaper vacuums before. I had not realized it really made a difference until a friend had purchased one of these a year ago. It truly is amazing, My floor literally feels like new, the carpet feels super clean and fluffy. I was really amazed how much extra this picks up compared to my old vacuum. I had read other reviews about people saying they were in disbelief about how much this actually picked up. I'm a true believer now, and would highly recommend this to others! Also comes with a ton of other assorted accesories that make cleaning around the house great!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUT A DYSON REFURB!!!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY A DYSON REFURB!!! This thing was unusable out of the box! It did not include all necessary parts! I didn't get any flexible hose to connect the vacuum base to anything else, so it is entirely unusable. It's an expensive boat anchor right now. Quality control seems to be non-existent. I'm just gonna return for a refund--- not worth taking another chance. Be Warned!
customer_reviews.author: ChemBird

customer_reviews.title: both vaccums performed adequately but for the price the animal was a better option.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sending this product back and purchasing the bigger option with Animal plus allergy, both vaccums performed adequately but for the price the animal was a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Langford

customer_reviews.title: No suction to pick up larger than a grain of ...
customer_reviews.text: No suction to pick up larger than a grain of sand. Also the huge ball makes it awkward, heavy and impossible to fit under tables, couches, etc.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing the amount of dirt this vacuum picks up
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing the amount of dirt this vacuum picks up. I have 2 dogs and it is great for the dog hair
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes D.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Owned less than 2 weeks and it's lost suction
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could leave a lower review. I have never been so excited about a purchase. And a product has never let me down as much as this. I used it once. Literally once. Went to use it today(time 2) only to discover it no longer maintains suction in the upright position unless you physically hold the canister with your hand which vacuuming. It must be a loose seal of some kind. I'm so disappointed. Maybe I just got a lemon. Guess we'll see. But I would expect it to last longer than a week for $400
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeBarLaw

customer_reviews.title: You will be surprised after using this vacuum. I ...
customer_reviews.text: You will be surprised after using this vacuum. I didn't know what is the difference among vacuums, but I realize now.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Well I've owned this less than three months and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Hikari

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful in its operation!! Just a bit hard to assemble though
customer_reviews.author: zedkay1985

customer_reviews.title: Recommend over shark vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I clean condos at the beach, which means a lot of sand. This vacuum does very well on carpet, tile and wood floors. I also use it at home. I have carpet and tile and 3 indoor cats. Vacuums up cat liter off tile very well and I'm amazed at how much I get out of the carpet each time. I also have a shark vacuum and recommend the dyson over it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L Conley

customer_reviews.title: I had high expectation, but its ok. However ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectation, but its ok. However, on the first week the unit broke and the handle was stuck and will not release. I called Dyson and once I shipped the old unit back, within 3 days I got a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MomboZNZ

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever purchased. I do with that there was more on board storage for all the attachments but i'll overlook it for the amount of power that this thing has. I also love that you can easily just wash the filters when they get dirty. I go though vacuums like crazy and I wish that I would have just bought one of these things a long time ago. Would have saved hundreds in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom. Too heavy for her so returned it. Pricey vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: llacosse

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit too heavy for vacuum.. Couldn't register my vacuum online?!!!
customer_reviews.author: Neta

customer_reviews.title: expensive and extremely difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: expensive and extremely difficult to assemble - cleaning filter looks like a major job - returned it
customer_reviews.author: cj4nomsg

product_meta.title: Dyson Ball Allergy Upright Vacuum
product_meta.description: Style:NewThe Dyson Ball Allergy vacuum has Radial Root cyclone technology, a self-adjusting cleaner head, Ball technology, whole-machine HEPA filtration and comes with a 5-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Strongest suction of any vacuum The Dyson Ball upright vacuum cleaner has the strongest suction of any vacuum
Radial Root Cyclone technology Dyson’s most advanced Radial Root Cyclone technology- Captures more dirt and microscopic dust
Self-adjusting cleaner head Automatically adjust to seal in suction across carpets and hard floors
Whole Machine HEPA filtration No other vacuum expels cleaner air Certified asthma & allergy friendly
Engineered to remove allergens Extra tools, engineered specifically for allergy sufferers, remove fine dust and allergens from difficult places
